data.title: Oklahoma State University Athletics
data.meta_description: Kenneth Harris (23) CB - Took a redshirt in 2023 for his first year at OSU ... An FBS transfer who played in 31 games and started 18 in his three years at Ar...
data.text:
Took a redshirt in 2023 for his first year at OSU ... An FBS transfer who played in 31 games and started 18 in his three years at Arkansas State.

2023: Played in the first four games while maintaining a redshirt his first year in Stillwater ... Recorded a solo tackle in the season-opening win over Central Arkansas ... Named OSU’s co-defense practice player of the week against Texas.

2022 (Junior at Arkansas State): Started all 12 games at cornerback … Totaled 36 tackles, including 29 solo stops, and 4.5 tackles for loss … Intercepted one pass and led the team with 10 pass breakups … His interception came in the first quarter against Southern Miss … Had a season high seven tackles against UMass with five solo stops … Had three games with multiple pass breakups and at least one in seven games.

2021 (Sophomore at Arkansas State): Appeared in nine games with two starts at cornerback … Second on the team and seventh in the Sun Belt with two interceptions for 29 yards … His interceptions came in back-to-back games against Louisiana and at South Alabama … Against the Ragin’ Cajuns, he returned his pick for 35 yards to set up a score … Finished with 11 total tackles, including nine solo tackles … Recorded a season-high four tackles at South Alabama … Had three multi-tackle games … Finished with at least one tackle in his final five games played … Also recorded six pass break-ups including two against Appalachian State and at Georgia State.

2020 (Freshman at Arkansas State): Played in 10 games as a true freshman, including four as a starter ... Ended the year with 24 tackles (20 solo/4 assisted) and six pass break-ups that tied the most on the team ... Posted a season-high eight tackles against South Alabama, and also had one pass break-up against the Jaguars ... Recorded five tackles, his second most of the year, versus Appalachian State ... Collected a season-high two pass break-ups against Kansas State ... Arkansas State AD’s Honor Roll member.

High School: Varsity football letterman at Caldwell Parish High School in Columbia, LA … Helped lead Caldwell Parish to a 10-2 record and the second round of the playoff in 2019 … Named First Team All-District 3-3A as both a wide receiver and defensive back his senior season … Earned honorable mention all-state honors from the Louisiana Sports Writers Association in 2019 ... Listed as a 3-star prospect by 247Sports, which also ranks him as the No. 68 overall player in the state of Louisiana and No. 139 cornerback in the nation … Also recruited by schools such as Memphis, Minnesota and Louisiana-Monroe.
